Name: Uncontrollable
Description: This unit can not be controlled. They will move, fight, and flee according to their own will.

Name: Unbreakable
Description: This unit' morale can not be broken. They will fight to the last if their commander wills it.

Name: Terrain Immunity
Description: This unit ignore all terrain effect.

Name: No Attack
Description: This unit is unable to perform any attack.

Name: No Skill
Description: This unit is unable to perform any skill.

Name: No Spell
Description: This unit is unable to perform any spell.

Name: Weather Immunity
Description: This unit is resilient against every kind of weather in existence. Rain will not make them wet, and fog will not hinder their vision.

Name: Temperature Immunity
Description: This unit is unsusceptible to temperature change. Neither cold nor heat can affect them in any way.

Name: Status Immunity
Description: This unit is immune to all status effects, both positive and negative.

Name: Immortal
Description: This unit is nigh impossible to kill by any ordinary means.

Name: Double Terrain Penalty
Description: This unit is unsuitable for uneven and unclear terrain. Making their movement impaired by terrain penalty even more.

Name: No Move
Description: This unit is unable to move by themselves.

Name: Gunpowder based Weapon
Description: This unit is equipped with a gunpowder-based weapons such as a musket. Rain weather will make their weapons at minimal effectiveness, and their shooting will produce a cloud of smoke that can block their vision.

Name: No Action
Description: This unit is unable to make any action by themselves.

Name: Cone Shot
Description: This unit’ weapons shoot in a cone-shaped spread, thus having lower accuracy for each ammunition shot.

Name: Attack Can Fail
Description: This unit’ inferior weapons can fail when attacking and cause damage to the wielders.

Name: Day Blindness
Description: This unit have eyes that is intolerant to light which causes them a degree of partial blindness, making them unable to fight at their best.

Name: Night Vision
Description: This unit is capable of fighting at full potential during nighttime.

Name: Varied Training
Description: This unit have not received standard training making them rely on their different background for combat.

Name: Arc Shot
Description: This unit’ weapons can shoot in an arc that bypasses all obstacles in front.

Name: Shoot While Moving
Description: This unit is capable of shooting their weapons while moving but with a penalty to accuracy.

Name: Stationary
Description: This unit’ weapons require them to be stationary to attack.

Name: Maximum Momentum
Description: This unit’ momentum is at maximum until the related effect expires.
